    • Method Detail

      • getRegisteredDefinitions

        public Collection<NotificationDefinition> getRegisteredDefinitions()
        Returns:
        Collection of all registered definitions.

      • getUserNotificationSchedules

        public Map<NotificationDefinition,NotificationScheduleTypes> getUserNotificationSchedules(Long userId)
                                                                                   throws NotFoundException,
                                                                                          AuthorizationException
        Method to get a map of all set notification definitions and schedules for a given user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The users id.
        Returns:
        A map of all set notification definitions and schedules
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - Thrown, when the user was not found.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user is not allowed to access the given properties.

      • postConstruct

        @PostConstruct
public void postConstruct()
        Post constructor to register default definitions.

      • register

        public void register(NotificationDefinition... definitions)
        Method to register new definitions.
        Parameters:
        definitions - The definitions to register.

      • saveUserNotificationSchedule

        public void saveUserNotificationSchedule(Long userId,
                                         NotificationDefinition definition,
                                         NotificationScheduleTypes scheduleType)
                                  throws NotFoundException,
                                         AuthorizationException
        Method to save a setting for the given user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user to save the setting for.
        definition - The definition to save.
        scheduleType - The schedule type to set. Use null to delete the setting.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - Thrown, when the user doesn't exists.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user is not allowed to access this settings.

      • saveUserNotificationSchedules

        public void saveUserNotificationSchedules(Long userId,
                                          Map<NotificationDefinition,NotificationScheduleTypes> mappings)
                                   throws NotFoundException,
                                          AuthorizationException
        Method to save schedules for the given user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user to save the setting for.
        mappings - Mappings from definitions to schedules.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - Thrown, when the user doesn't exists.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user is not allowed to access this settings.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Long noteId,
                        Long userToNotify,
                        NotificationDefinition notificationDefinition,
                        Map<String,Object> model)
        Send notifications to users to inform about created or edited notes.
        Parameters:
        noteId - Id of the note, which should be send. the note to inform about
        userToNotify - Id of the user to notify.
        notificationDefinition - The current definition of the notification.
        model - Additional elements used for the velocity context.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Note note,
                        Collection<User> usersToNotify,
                        NotificationDefinition notificationDefinition)
        Send notifications to users to inform about created or edited notes.
        Parameters:
        note - the note to inform about
        usersToNotify - the users to be notified
        notificationDefinition - The current definition of the notification.

      • unregister

        public void unregister(NotificationDefinition... definitions)

      • userHasSchedule

        public boolean userHasSchedule(Long userId,
                               NotificationDefinition definition,
                               NotificationScheduleTypes schedule)
        Parameters:
        userId - The user.
        definition - The definition to check.
        schedule - The schedule to check.
        Returns:
        True, if the use has set the requested scheduling.
